name: Grimace
description: Grimace is a mostly indica strain that brings to mind a large, conic purple character, one of the many off-putting mascots representing a well-known fast food hamburger franchise. The connection makes sense the moment you see the bulbous purple-hued buds produced by Grimace plants. Little is known about where this mysterious phenotype came from, but indica genetics are evident in Grimace's sedating, mellow effects.
descriptionPlain: Grimace is a mostly indica strain that brings to mind a large, conic purple character, one of the many off-putting mascots representing a well-known fast food hamburger franchise. The connection makes sense the moment you see the bulbous purple-hued buds produced by Grimace plants. Little is known about where this mysterious phenotype came from, but indica genetics are evident in Grimace's sedating, mellow effects.

highlightedReviews.text: This is a really cool strain I came across in my ventures- Its a COMPLETELY purple plant/bud, EXCEPT the fact that the stem ALWAYS stays lime green on this strain unlike some or a few other purple buds etc- (You can make a plant purple, this is one that is NATURALLY like this, not altered.) It can be a very dank bud when grown and cured properly. I liked it more for the gimmick of smoking a purple bud, I didn't think it was the strongest or best in any way for me at the time- But I've come to remember it as a unique strain in my journal for sure. A must try if you are able to do so. -_-
This strain is so tight! I love smoking it and then going on walks and listening to music! i just get so immersed in the music as a deep relaxation sets in. One of my favourite strains, :)

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Blue Heron, Haze Heaven, Grimace, Garlic Bud, and Nurse Jackie
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
New strains are here, and many more are on the way! Using the Leafly app, it's now possible to nominate strains for inclusion in the Explorer. Simply enter the strain into the search bar on the "Explore Strains" page, and if no results surface, you'll be given the option to submit this variety. Keep in mind that we won't be able to tend to all requests, but we'll do what we can to make it happen as long as we can still eat, sleep, and go home every once in while.
   1. Blue Heron
Characteristics of Blue Heron:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Magoo and Huckleberry
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Blueberry, rose, and citrus aroma
Flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Haze Heaven
Characteristics of Haze Heaven:

60/40 indica-domintant hybrid
Cross between Northern Lights #5, Haze, Afghani, and Hawaiian
Breeder: Soma Seeds
Musky, spicy aroma
Buzzing cerebral energy paired with mellow, relaxing body effects
Flowering time of 10 to 11 weeks

   3. Grimace
Characteristics of Grimace: 

Mostly indica strain
Unknown genetics
Sedating, mellow effects
Grows into large, conic, purple buds (that may or may not look just like this off-putting fast-food mascot)

   4. Garlic Bud
Characteristics of Garlic Bud:

Mostly indica strain
Bred using Afghani genetics
Breeder: The Seed Bank (now Sensi Seeds)
Pungent spicy, musky aroma
Relaxing body effects coupled with an invigorating cerebral buzz
Flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   5. Nurse Jackie
Characteristics of Nurse Jackie:

85/15 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Jack the Ripper and Medicine Woman
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sour citrus aroma
Clear-headed, functional buzz
